WRITING.TITLE: How the hell do you stay alive in Rush, Conquest, Operations?
WRITING.TEXT:
I don't know why, but I simply can not play these modes it's just spawn die spawn die, It seems like you're surrounded by enemies from all possible directions and there's little you can do to survive more than 10 seconds. Please help me understand what I'm doing wrong, because TDM and domination are only game modes that I'm able to play and have fun at, I can average 25-5 on domination easily, but on rush that I just played I was 18-32, I don't know why, I can't stay alive in these game modes, I'm doing everything I can to help the team, I don't dive in to the center of the action.
Maybe some of you here experienced the same thing? Please share your opinion.

WRITING.TITLE: How can I mask Audio Spectrum?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys, I'm fairly new to AE and now I'm working on an audio project which includes audio spectrum. My issue is that I can't mask the audio spectrum to a desired shape. On the other hand if I select rectangle tool and select whatever area of audio spectrum I want to be shown I'm able to do that, but when it comes to drawing a certain shape with a pen tool and masking the audio spectrum it only follows the rectangular shape mask. Is it possible to mask an audio spectrum layer to a specific shape? See picture as an example. https://i.imgur.com/x9yeY3O.png
We are not a poor country.
Grupo i
Also playing with controller instead of mouse and keyboard makes it even more difficult.

Well then its not your style game, this game was purposely made to be complicated. Is war simple as run and shoot? No, war is all about strategies and outsmarting your enemy. It really is a fun game once you learn the mechanics.

It is frustrating in the beginning, I had my struggles too, spawn die spawn die, but after playing the game more and more you start to understand its mechanics, you become more aware of things that you ignored previously like filling squads, not skipping after you die, always thinking where the enemy might be, flanking the enemy to get easy satisfying kills and obviously staying close with your teammates.
And of course remember that sometimes you'll have a bad day where things just doesn't go your way.
